data.title: Basil of Baker Street
data.meta_description: With his keen deduction skills, Basil expertly scans enemies for weaknesses and dodges those ruffians who seek to harm him.
data.text:
Specify number or math expression, e.g. x*1.2

On The Mark

Basil scans enemies' weak points and throws 20 darts at them. Basil targets the enemy with the least HP with each dart, dealing 180k + 1.4bd damage to each enemy and studying them for 7 seconds.

Clever Concoction

Basil throws an Erlenmeyer flask at the farthest studied enemy, dealing 850k+9sp damage over 10 seconds to enemies in an area.

Good Deduction

Every 8 seconds, Basil dodges an enemy's basic attack or skill and counters by studying the attacker for 12 seconds.

The study has a chance to fail against enemies above level <level>.

Closer Inspection

If an enemy Tank Hero attempts to apply a Study to Basil or one of his allies, the Study is prevented and Basil Studies the enemy for 10 seconds instead.

Basil gains 45 Energy whenever an enemy is Studied. He gains an additional 155 Energy if the Studied enemy is a Tank Hero.

The Energy gained is less effective against enemies above Level <level>.

Wise Observation

Basil removes 300 energy when he damages a studied enemy with "On The Mark."

Every 3 basic attacks, Basil applies a damage over time to an enemy that deals 790k + 8.85sp over 12 seconds.

The amount of energy removed is less effective against enemies above level <level>.
